files.content:
name: 'EC2 CCS 128'
type: module
description: 'A trivial Drupal 11 custom module for CCS-128 task.'
core_version_requirement: ^11
package: Custom

<?php

use Drupal\Core\Extension\ModuleHandlerInterface;

/**
 * Implements hook_help().
 */
function ec2_ccs_128_help(\$route_name, \Drupal\Core\Routing\RouteMatchInterface \$route_match) {
  if (\$route_name == 'help.page.ec2_ccs_128') {
    return t('This is a trivial help section for the EC2 CCS 128 module.');
  }
}

# EC2 CCS 128 Module

This is a minimal Drupal 11 custom module created for the CCS-128 task. It provides a trivial help section on the module page.
